sentences.en: A handful of good life is better than a bushel of learning.
sentences.cn: 一把好日子胜过一蒲式耳的学问.

sentences.en: A handful of onlookers stand in the field watching.
sentences.cn: 少数几个旁观者站在现场观看。

sentences.en: By the time he was 15, Scott had gigged with a handful of well-known small bands.
sentences.cn: 到15岁的时候，斯科特已经与几支闻名遐迩的小乐队同台演出过。

sentences.en: He surveyed the handful of custo-mers at the bar.
sentences.cn: 他打量着吧台那边零星的几个顾客。

sentences.en: He surveyed the handful of customers at the bar.
sentences.cn: 他打量着吧台边仅有的几位顾客。

sentences.en: I'd taken a handful of uppers.
Only a handful had returned to work in the immediate vicinity.
sentences.cn: 仅有几个人回到临近地区工作。

sentences.en: Only a handful of firms offer share option schemes to all their employees.
sentences.cn: 只有少数几家公司向所有员工提供股票期权方案。

sentences.en: Only a handful of people were dead set on following him.
sentences.cn: 死心塌地跟他走的只是一小撮.

sentences.en: Self-evidently a handful of companies will benefit.
sentences.cn: 不言而喻的是少数几个公司会受益。

sentences.en: Steve barely said a handful of words during the first half hour.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫在前半小时里没说几句话.

sentences.en: The band are playing a handful of shows at smaller venues.
sentences.cn: 乐队要在小一点的场馆举办几场演出。

sentences.en: The boy picked up a handful of stones and started throwing them at us.
sentences.cn: 那男孩捡起一把石子，开始朝我们扔过来。

sentences.en: There were only a handful of people there.
They constitute but a handful of the number.
sentences.cn: 他们只不过是其中的一小撮.

sentences.en: We invited 30 people, but only a handful came.
sentences.cn: 我们邀请了30人, 但是只到了几个人.

sentences.en: Zara can be a handful sometimes.

phrases.tran_cn: 少数的人；少量的几个人

trans.tran_cn: 少数，少量，一把（的量），难以控制的人（或动物），棘手事
trans.tran_en: an amount that you can hold in your hand
